product_title: VOLTAS Vectra 4 in 1 Convertible 1.5 Ton 3 Star Inverter Split AC with Anti Dust Filter (2023 Model, Copper Condenser)
overview_text:
Efficient Cooling
The 441CFM VOLTAS VECTRA 1.5-Ton Split Air Conditioner is an ideal choice if you’re looking for a way to effectively cool spaces up to 180Sq.Ft. What's more, this AC is designed to cool your indoor environment even when the ambient temperature reaches 52°C to provide relief from scorching summer conditions.
Fast Cooling
Powered by Fast Cooling technology, this split air conditioner swiftly brings down the temperature in your room, making it the perfect choice for scorching summer days. Following an intense day of outdoor activities, this AC offers immediate relief by cooling down your living space within no time.
4-in-1 Convertible Mode
You can make the most of this AC's 4-in-1 convertible mode and adapt its cooling capacity to your preferences, thereby enjoying an energy-efficient and personalised cooling experience.
Super Dry Mode
This AC features a Super Dry mode that helps reduce the moisture level in the ambient air, providing comfort against humidity.
Sleep Mode
Rest easy with the sleep mode in this AC, which is designed to provide a comfortable environment while you sleep.
High-EER Rotary BLDC Compressor
The high-EER rotary BLDC compressor in this 1.5-ton AC ensures lasting performance and cooling efficiency. Besides, owing to its 3-star rating, this air conditioner is a fairly economical choice for your home.
Copper Condenser Coil
With its copper condenser coil, this VOLTAS air conditioner effectively manages heat exchange efficiency to cool your space in the minimum possible time.
Antibacterial, Anti-Dust Filter
Fitted with an efficient antibacterial, anti-dust filter, this AC plays a vital role in removing dust, allergens, and airborne impurities, so you can always breathe in clean, hygienic air.
Auto-Restart Function
Its auto-restart function ensures that after a power failure, this AC conveniently starts again automatically to ensure minimum cooling disruptions.
Auto-Clean Mode
This air conditioner incorporates an auto-clean mode, eliminating the hassle of maintaining a clean and well-functioning unit.
R32 Refrigerant
This air conditioner is engineered to deliver both efficient and environment-friendly cooling, thanks to its use of the R32 refrigerant.
Stabiliser-Free Operation
With stabiliser-free operation, this air conditioner can handle voltage fluctuations without the need for a separate stabiliser.
Inverter-Compatible AC
As this AC is inverter-compatible, you can still enjoy its cooling in case of a power cut.
key_features: 1.5 Ton Inverter Split AC, 3 Star Rating
1 Year Comprehensive Warranty, 10 Years Compressor Warranty
High Ambient Cooling, Anti Microbial Air Filteration
